gitGraph
    commit id: "ZERO"
    branch develop
    branch release
    commit id:"A"
    checkout main
    commit id:"ONE"
    checkout develop
    commit id:"B"
    checkout main
    merge develop id:"MERGE"
    commit id:"TWO"
    checkout release
    cherry-pick id:"MERGE" parent:"B"
    commit id:"THREE"
    checkout develop
    commit id:"C"
---
ZERO---ONE---[MERGE]---TWO  (main)
    \       /       \
     \-----B---C     \      (develop)
      \               \
       A---------------THREE  (release)
